posts.post_content:
SOLD.

Fred was born in VT, not MA, so he has to go. :)  The card has corner and edge wear, chipping, damage from a thumbtack, staining (top left,) and a couple of print dots.  The back is clean with some paper loss, chipping, and surface wrinkles.

$70 shipped. PayPal preffered, USPS money orders and personal checks accepted.  Card will be held until personal check clears.  Emails take priority over posts.

[IMG]http://i139.photobucket.com/albums/q319/jay1065/Temp/oj1.jpg[/IMG]
